text: Jack Wagner may refer to: *Jack Wagner (screenwriter) (1891–1963), U.S. screenwriter *Jack Wagner (announcer) (1925–1995), announcer for Disney theme parks *Jack Wagner (actor) (born 1959), actor and singer *Jack Wagner (politician) (born 1948), former Auditor General of Pennsylvania ==See also== *John Wagner (disambiguation) *Jack Wrangler (1946–2009), American actor
title: Jack Wagner
